description.fr: {%appearance} Inflige son {%AT} aux adversaires autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de lui si vous avez un autre compagnon {%FAMILY_GREATVILAIN_NAME} d'équipé.
description.en: {%appearance} Inflicts {%AT} on surrounding\_<sprite name="cell_around"> opponents if you have another {%FAMILY_GREATVILAIN_NAME} companion equipped.
description.es: {%appearance} Inflige su {%AT} a los adversarios a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> si tienes otro compañero {%FAMILY_GREATVILAIN_NAME} equipado.
description.de: {%appearance} Verursacht bei den Gegnern ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> seinen {%AT} als Schaden, wenn du einen anderen {%FAMILY_GREATVILAIN_NAME}-Begleiter ausgerüstet hast.
description.pt: {%appearance} Inflige seu {%AT} aos adversários em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> se você tiver outro companheiro {%FAMILY_GREATVILAIN_NAME} equipado.
